mapper.sql: operatorId, code, name, enable, region, pinYin, beid
mapper.insert: insert into bas_operation_people (operatorId, code, name, enable, region, pinYin, beid) values (#{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bas_operation_people
operatorId,
code,
name,
enable,
region,
pinYin,
beid,

mapper.update:
update bas_operation_people
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region = #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where operatorId = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_operation_people set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region = #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where operatorId = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bas_operation_people where 1=1 and beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid} ${filter}
select * from bas_operation_people where code = #{code} and beid = #{beid}
mapper.update: update bas_operation_people set enable='0' where beid = #{beid};
